EmailTemplate.subject: GDPR Erasure Request - Delete Candidate information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
GDPR Erasure Request - Delete Candidate information Dear SDL Branch
Re. {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
{!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} has requested erasure under GDPR.
Please ensure that in branch any personal info held (NOT in TR) is erased with immediate effect.
This should include any CV's or profiles held on a desktop/shared drive, mobile number or email addresses held on mobiles or paper printouts. Please ensure this candidate is removed from any pre-existing mailout lists.
Thank you
Data Processing Lead - Supplydesk
